quote.quotepara: Thanks you Todd. And yes, if anyone has anything please they are willing to share please let me know.
hi shawn. there are no growl notifications for gmail built into Fluid. has anyone developed a userscript that does that already that they can share with shawn? todd
On Wed, May 21, 2008 at 6:50 AM, Shawn Roberts <shawnmrobe...@gmail.com> wrote:

I really think the Fluid.app is a great thing but I am having some issues with notifications using a Gmail instance. Is there a particular script I need in order to add this feature. Or, is it possible I am doing something wrong? I apologize in advance if this subject has already been posted and answered previously.
